title: LLM Dataset Processor
description: Processes a dataset by sending a specified field to an LLM API and appending the responses to a new dataset.

inputDatasetId.title: Input Dataset ID
inputDatasetId.description: The ID of the dataset to process.

model.title: LLM Model
model.description: The LLM model to use (e.g., gpt-4o-mini).

llmApiToken.title: LLM API Token
llmApiToken.description: Your API token for the LLM service (e.g., OpenAI).

temperature.title: Temperature
temperature.description: Sampling temperature for the LLM API (controls randomness).

prompt.title: Prompt
prompt.description: The prompt to send to the LLM API. You can include placeholders like {{field}} to insert data from the dataset.

skipItemIfEmpty.title: Skip item if one or more {{field}} are empty
skipItemIfEmpty.description: Items in the dataset will be skipped if one or more {{field}} are empty.

maxTokens.title: Max Tokens
maxTokens.description: Maximum number of tokens in the LLM API response.
